name: Red Planet Revolution Prototype
description:
For years, the people of your planet have buckled under the corporate tyranny. It's time to take a stand! You are one of the leaders of an underground movement aimed at changing your world. Send your agents to recruit new supporters, but watch out for the government's Security Police. A better future awaits you!

This is a prototype made as part of My First Game Jam 2021. Huge thanks to the organisers and communty!
